This game is survivor's based, in fact for cowards who route for the easy way: Running away from risks or danger. Survivors have so many advantages over the killer, first of all they are 4 against 1, they have pallets everywhere on the map to slow down the killer, torches that blind the killer for so many seconds, they can even 
delete hooks just like this and the killer after hitting a survivor gets a reset that takes so long and allow the survivor to flee so fast. On top of that, there are more maps in favour of survivors, they can hide so easily and it is almost impossible for the killer to spot them quickly since they can get to generators quickly. 
Fuck that game, fuck these cowards of survivors.

The thrill of competing against another human is fantastic. The downside is you're competing against another human and well, not all of us are kind creatures all the time. 

I recommend making or playing with friends on voice chat, it makes a difference and is the primary reason I still enjoy the game enough to write this recommendation. :)
Juego entretenido para jugar solo o con amigos y requiere un reto para todos.

i have over 200 h on this game on ps4 some good stuff

[b]Dead by Daylight[/b] is a asymmetrical competitive multiplayer game. The musical setting gives a character of horror, which lasts until the end of each game. Players are very friendly and helpful. Killers don't camp and tunnel. Playing as survivor with other three random players is something really magician. If your loop fail, your teammates always help you. They will unhook you in vary safe situation. They will show you how to loop better and repair generators faster. Killers when he sees the novice player he will help him acquire better skills or even the game will not go well will allow him to leave.
이겜에서 살인마하면 왕따 간접체험 할수있음 추천함
好玩就是血压高，萌新没准备好治高血压就不要玩屠夫

One of the best 1 v 4 horror games i would recommend it to almost everyone the almost being littler kids, and the fact they come out with new survivors and killers often a not every year one comes out like some other games in the end yes i would let my friends borrow it that`s how much i think other people should play it.

KInda good, kinda bad. Get ready to rage. Play with friends if you want to get screamed on. If you don't, get ready to play with some bad randoms and smash your computer. Good luck if you buy the game!
초보자에게 매우 친절한 게임입니다 무조건 살인마 하세여 화이팅
很好玩，玩了以后不想睡觉，还想玩

Edit: Almost after three weeks, I got a reply and they gave my all of my stuff back plus 200.000 blood points as a gift. But that sadly doesnt compensate for the amount of time, rift levels I couldve done etc. lost. Because I was afraid of playing would make no difference+would make it more complicated to fix my account so I was waiting. I also have lost the discounts couldve been able to get one more survivor or killer. But nevertheless, atleast I got my stuff back in the end. Still wont turn this into a positive yet though. I need to see some good stories about their support and data first.

Edit: Its been two weeks with no answers. They are just sending automated messages like "we did not forget you but we are busy" and that is it. I feel like their support team is nonexistent at this point.

After merging my Iridescent rank account from Epic to Steam I've lost all my progress, items, levels and so on even though It clearly says for synchronization "It's a combination of summed values and highest values. Items with a level are merged by taking the highest level from all linked accounts; items which can be counted are merged by taking the total number of items across all linked accounts."

And when you look this up people with minor loses like only a few levels on characters or rift are being responded by "The only way to fix this is by contacting support but looking at their response time It is quicker to get those levels back by playing anyway"

I can't waste another hundred hours on this platform too to reach Iridescent and have level 50 each and lose my event items.

You may think why are you giving thumbs down for a technical support? Well because thats not just it. The game is pretty much unbalanced. Full of toxicity. Solo queues here are worse than apex solos. There are more to talk but seeing how redditors are one sided they would go full Karen mode to protect how strong their side should remain acting like they are weak and all and dont need nerfs and they need buffs instead.

Dbd is one of those games that will make you so frustrated you actually get sick and decide to stop sitting in your hobbit hole and want to touch some grass for once in your life, or you will decide you like the torture and freely allow yourself to get camped by an insidious bubba- take your pick.

tbh i'd still say dead by daylight is a great game (depending on what you like of course) is it really worth £15? probably not considering half of the survivours and killers are dlc, just get when it goes on sale, but honestly i still have a lot of fun and get a lot of laughs out of this game

it should be known to anyone buying dbd that the devs *are* actually dogsh*t and don't listen to their audience but apart from that all is well

it's really subjective on what your main interests are to determine if you would like the game, if you like horror franchises such as films or horror games then i would recommend, since i personally enjoy picking up dlcs that collab with things i like (coming from a leon/cheryl main) it just makes it a lot cooler imo

but yeah, if after reading this you decide you actually want to give it a try.. just know you've been warned and will spend the next 20 years of your life being hunted down not just by killers but your ever-declining self esteem induced by being teabagged and tunneled by toxic killers and survivours
 
So after all:

Do devs listen? No.
Is the game fun? No
Is the game balanced? No
Is the community toxic? Yes
Will i continue to play? Yes

PCとコンシューマ機併せて１５００時間程度プレイしました。
非対称型ホラー鬼ごっこ対戦という新ジャンルを確立し６周年を迎えたゲームであり、
ホラー鬼ごっこゲームとして見ると一流のゲームです。

しかし、対戦ゲームとして見ると三流のゲームであり、プレイヤーの不満点はかなり多いです。
非対称の陣営のバランスの悪さ、各パーク(スキルのようなもの)やキラー間の強弱のバランスの悪さ、
マップの構造の悪さ、BOTへの対応の悪さ、煽りプレイヤーを推奨するようなシステム、
そして何より運営の対応・態度の悪さがここ数年目立ち続けており改善される見込みがありません。

とはいえこれを超えるゲームもまだ出ていないので替えが効かない状況です。
ホラーゲームとして興味があるのであれば少しやってみるのも良いと思いますが、
対戦ゲームとして長く続けるのはおすすめできません。
very very good very very nice
pretty fun game, devs still update it from time to time.
This game made my heart pound faster than my exes; not recommended 1/10.

This game is fun. I honestly just really like the cosmetics and the little charms that you get from the rift to help decorate your survivor and killer. The game play is fun but the lag sometimes that you get playing with counsel is wild but overall pretty chill game!
Very fun to play with friends. Definitely worth checking out

Não é um jogo pra todo mundo. Dito isso, Dead By Daylight é uma experiência única dentro do mercado de jogos multiplayer. Apesar de algumas escolhas questionáveis de design de gameplay, a verdade é que eu me sinto animada pra jogar, e isso é fato.
recagaron todo mas bugs y algunas habilidades de killers desactivadas

The game is overall fun, there is some plays that camp and just be really unfair. If you get the fair ones and play the game a lot you can juke the killer and get some good laughs! If you like these type of games, I recommend!
Always have a good laugh & a few jump scares with friends in this game, 10/10!

You ever play that game as a kid where you have absolutely no idea where anything is, who anyone is, what anyone does, but you just pick something roll with it and it works? Yeah? No? Well thats me as an adult with DBD. I started this game on console and played it for laughs and giggles but stopped because I was no good and now I'm here...I'm winning matches sickin my blade on foos but I have NO clue where hatches are on maps, what a boon toter is, what a hex toter is, I JUST CRUSH ANYTHING IN MY WAY MUWHAHAHA.
讲真的，一点也不好玩，嗯，一点也不好玩（狗头）
游戏挺好的，主玩屠夫玩了几十场老是被人类嘲讽。有局玩军团每个人都二挂了，结果四个人都没死蹲在门口嘲讽我。当时直接心态爆炸，我感觉要是知到那几个人的地址我能直接杀过去。反正玩屠夫心态挺容易炸的，游戏还是听好的。不知道为啥我匹的贼慢，谁能告诉我咋办吗
da game is ighh rate a 8/10

Absolutely amazing game, not a single bad thing to say about it and if anyone tells you otherwise they're lying to your face...the same face that was probably just infront of a Bubba on the hook in the basement but that's the best part about this game, infact we need MORE basement bubbas...AND Mr puddles (look it up) you will never see anyone as cute as Mr puddles he is quite frankly the ultimate UwU

love you all stay positive and always camp, tunnel and slug!!!!

great game buy it when its on sale and maybe buy an outfit or two, then buy all the characters then all the outfits that are cool for them, then buy stuff for survivors when you don't even play survivors then play bubba then get mad that it takes so long to get in a match but then remember there's skill bases match making, anyway you should get the game it's real fun with friends, like i got 30 hours in the first week, my kids may hate me but i know i'll always hate myself.

successfully landing a lethal rush attack on a survivor with blight is the most satisfying thing in my life right now

if you play solo queue, whether you win depends mainly on your teammates' skill level. it's best to play with friends.

Juego muy entretenido. Si jugas en equipo como survivor es divertidisimo! Solitario es mejor como killer ya que survivor no siempre encontras buenos compañeros.
